body.p: The Wine development release 1.1.29 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Improved Gecko integration by using Wine's network layers.
Use of external libmpg123 for mp3 decoding.
Support for JPEG and PNG formats in WindowsCodecs.
Many regression test fixes for Win64 and Windows 7.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
